attributes.comment:
I am 100% opposed to the proposal to increase USCIS filing fees of any kind. I
am in the process of adopting a child and hope to adopt more. Adoption is
expensive enough already and that is a natural deterrent to good would-be homes
for unwanted children. It is unconscionable for the government to raise fees by up
to 66% for adoption-related petitions. Further, immigrants seeking to do the right
thing by following the proper processes under USCIS are only further punished by
raised fees.
As I stated, I am 100% opposed to this and believe it is an abhorrent gesture!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Amy B. Messersmith
